section6.subtitle: Meet the team

section1.title: We are Orion-Trans Providing You with the most actionable Rail Freight Service
section1.subtitle: We are professional logistics specialists with a passion for quality and efficiency. We believe in integrity, trust, and continuous improvement. We promise to listen and provide You with reliable freight forwarding services over the globe.

section2.subtitle1: Orion-Trans is an international modern company of rail freight forwarding services, based in Kyrgyzstan, Bishkek. We met up to make logistics services in more than 20 nations over the globe and have been operating on the market since 2012, thereby have proved to our clients and partners our level of professionalism in the logistics field.
section2.subtitle2: Countries we're carrying out international freight forwarding services:

section3.title: What we offer
section3.subtitle1: We offer to our clients the most actionable solutions in freight-forwarding services. Our team of professional logistics specialists will develop a plan of the whole transportation arrangement for your business.
section3.subtitle2: We will calculate for you all of the necessary rail freight-forwarding tariffs across more than 20 countries, by import, export, transit and internal consignment and find for you a needed rolling stock to ship your cargo.

section4.subtitle1: To ensure businesses with all the necessary freight-forwarding services on the market: to be the most secure and trusted freight-forwarding company for the businesses, and to continuously improve the quality level of the services and work approach for the sake of the businesses.
section4.subtitle2: We see ourselves as the number one secure freight-forwarding company on the logistics market, who ensure new innovative logistics services to our clients and partners and create and develop convenient workplaces our team.

section5.subtitle: Efficiently organize and accompany rail freight transportation, creating a fast, convenient and accessible rail freight.
objectives: Create an efficient chain of partnership with the railways, transport companies, and other freight-forwarding companies.
Continuously improve the quality level of professionalism and skills of our team - logistics specialists.
Enhance the quality of customer services and meet their requests
Integrating and developing the modern innovative technology to create more efficient and accessible freight-forwarding solutions for our clients and partners.

section1.title: Service That Lead The Way To Better Business
section1.subtitle: We offer a full range of railway logistics services, ensuring reliability and timeliness. Our specialists will provide you with optimal rates and professional consultations, while our individual approach will help solve any of your requests. By choosing Orion-Trans, you receive quality and reliability proven over time.

section1.title:
We Work With The
Best {{item}}
section1.subtitle: The use of railroads and trains to convey cargo on land is known as rail freight transport. Rail transport is popular, especially in continents with extensive journey durations, such as China, Russia, the United States and Europe. Freight trains can transport a variety of cargo, including freight containers, automobiles, cattle, grains, coal, minerals and metals. Bulk goods, standardized shipping containers, or particularly constructed carriages for a specific sort of freight can all be transported by freight trains. Rail freight travels far more quickly than ocean freight. It costs more than sea freight, but less than air freight. Moving high-value industrial products like automobiles, electronics, and computer equipment, as well as promotional items, by train is ideal.
